alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:03PM CST until January 30 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Clarke and Washington Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Leroy. * WHEN...From late Friday night to late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, flooding of low lying farm and pasturelands begins. Cattle in low lying areas should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 24.3 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. &&
